Warm and dry weather to continue through the end of the week.  Pearson’s North Idaho Type 2 IMT is managing the Gibralter Ridge and Caribou Fires. Acreage and containment figures are updated when new information is available.  Gibralter Ridge Fire: Burn-out operations took place over the last few days along Grave Creek Rd. Mop-up...
